question: Which two countries share the location of the "Geschriebenstein Mountain"?
explanation: Hungary and Austria are the two countries that share the location of the "Geschriebenstein Mountain". The Geschriebenstein is a mountain, 884 metres high, located on the border between Austria and Hungary. It is the highest mountain of the Koszeg Mountains, the highest point in western Hungary (Transdanubia) and the highest point in Burgenland.
